Faults.message: We’re sorry for the loss of supply. We currently have a fault affecting the areas listed. We are working hard to get the power back on as quickly as we can. If you need more information, please call us on 105 or send us a message on Facebook or Twitter (@ssencommunity) and quote reference 'KN7232'
Faults.name: BH25 Area

Faults.name: GU47 Area

Messages.text: Engineers are responding to a main network fault in the area. We aim to restore power by 07:00.

Faults.message: We're sorry for the power cut affecting your area. Due to Storm Otto bringing high wind speeds across our network, it means we're experiencing a higher number of faults than normal. It also means it's not safe for us to complete repairs at this time and we also need to assess the extent of damage caused to then be able to restore your power. At this stage, we're unable to provide an estimated time of restoration, however, our teams are working as hard as they can to assess the situation and provide you with a realistic timescale. We're expecting an update to be available by midday, so please register for updates on this fault and we'll let you know if anything changesi.
